price: Tuzobaha n’umwuhiro w’inzoga zitaboreza, ibirahuri vy’inzoga bikurakuranwa, bahererekanya hagati yabo mu Bwami bw’ijuru; nya nzoga, nta ho zisa zisana n’izo kw’isi ziyayura umutwe, umuntu agatangura kudedemba avuga ayamuhe yitonganya;
arabic: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ

meta.transliteration: yatanāzaʿūna fīhā kasan lā laghwun fīhā walā tathīmun
translations: They will pass to one another
